title: Food, buses, and cash: Getting votes the Egyptian way
text:
Food, buses, and cash: Getting votes the Egyptian way 7:47am EDT - 01:54 
The going rate for a vote in Egypt's presidential election was 50 to 100 Egyptian pounds ($3 to $5), but heading down to a polling station could have also landed you a box of groceries or even half-price tickets to an amusement park.   
The going rate for a vote in Egypt's presidential election was 50 to 100 Egyptian pounds ($3 to $5), but heading down to a polling station could have also landed you a box of groceries or even half-price tickets to an amusement park.  //www.reuters.com/video/2018/03/29/food-buses-and-cash-getting-votes-the-eg?videoId=413106350&videoChannel=13421
